Seems this bug got lost in the shuffle.  But I believe this was fixed for 2.1. 
Can you please retest with 2.1 RC4?  Or provide a test case if it still doesn't
work?  Thanks.

Upon closer inspection, this looks nearly indentical to 70244 and 69199.  Can't
reproduce so I'm going to mark as duplicate.
